course_title: Special Topics:African Studies: African Diaspora in Americas
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 3 / Seats Avail: 1Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(Same as AAS 385 2, HIST 396 2)
This course is an interdisciplinary survey and analysis of the formation of Atlantic African identities, cultures, and societies in the Western Hemisphere since the 16th century.
course_description: May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
sections: Class Nbr: 4419, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: W. Rucker, Status: Open
